title: Boston Marathon Bombing Trial Ends Week One
teaser: A long line of victims and first responders have already taken the stand, and the defense so far is contesting nothing.
contentencoded:
After two days, testimony is over for the week in the trial of now admitted Boston Marathon bomber Dzhokhar Tsarnaev. A long line of victims and first responders have already taken the stand. From the Here & Now Contributors Network, David Boeri of WBUR reports that the defense so far is contesting nothing.

  • Listen to “Finish Line,” WBUR and The Boston Globe’s podcast about the trial
  • Read more on this story via WBUR

Guest

  • David Boeri, senior reporter for WBUR. He tweets @davidboeri.
